statements: SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_components;
SELECT component_name, supplier_name FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM quantum_hardware_components ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE quantity = 0;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, component_id ASC
SELECT component_name, supplier_name FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE supplier_name='IBM' OR supplier_name='Google' ORDER BY component_name
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM quantum_hardware_components
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE component_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_components FROM quantum_hardware_components
SELECT * FROM quantum_components;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM quantum_components WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT component_id, component_name, quantity FROM quantum_components ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_orders WHERE order_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM quantum_components WHERE component_name LIKE '%flux%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM quantum_components WHERE component_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM procurement_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT component_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM procurement_orders GROUP BY component_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT qc.component_name, po.order_date FROM quantum_components qc JOIN procurement_orders po ON qc.component_id = po.component_id ORDER BY po.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents;
SELECT component_name, price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT component_name, quantity_in_stock FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT component_name, total_price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents JOIN Orders ON QuantumHardwareComponents.component_id = Orders.component_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents;
SELECT component_name, price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT component_name, quantity_in_stock FROM QuantumHardwareComponents ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT c.component_name, s.supplier_name FROM QuantumHardwareComponents c INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON c.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.component_name, s.supplier_name FROM Orders o INNER JOIN QuantumHardwareComponents c ON o.component_id = c.component_id INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_condition FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND location = 'Warehouse B';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND quantity > 20 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents ORDER BY component_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT component_name, price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT component_id, component_name, price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_components FROM QuantumHardwareComponents GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY component_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT component_name, price FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT component_name, supplier_id FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents WHERE component_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareComponents ORDER BY supplier_id, price DESC
